## Research Focus

I am a researcher at [Małopolska Centre of Biotechnology](https://mbc.uj.edu.pl/), specializing in deep learning with a focus on:

* Tabular Deep Learning
* AI for Metagenomics

I'm doing my PhD at the [GMUM](https://gmum.net/) lab.

### Research Team Member
